data.name: The Unnamed Game
data.detailed_description:
You wake up after a crash on a distant planet.
Play as a soldier with your friends, beat zombies and magic creatures to find your way home.
Be careful! You have only one life.

  • Permanent death
  • Unique character skills customization
  • Optional PvP
  • Open world
  • Global and local chat
  • Friendlist
  • Leaderboard
  • Servers in EU, NA, Asia
data.about_the_game:
You wake up after a crash on a distant planet.
Play as a soldier with your friends, beat zombies and magic creatures to find your way home.
Be careful! You have only one life.

  • Permanent death
  • Unique character skills customization
  • Optional PvP
  • Open world
  • Global and local chat
  • Friendlist
  • Leaderboard
  • Servers in EU, NA, Asia
data.short_description: The Unnamed Game is a top-down hardcore online game where you beat monsters to survive on a cursed reality.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4600 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 420 or ATI Radeon HD 5570
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500k or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or ATI Radeon HD 7850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X Version 10.7 Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo, Core i3, Core i5, Core i7, or Xeon processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 320M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Version 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, Core i7, or Xeon processor
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4600 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 420 or ATI Radeon HD 5570
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 21.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500k or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or ATI Radeon HD 7850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
